item.title: 尽管征收关税，泰国出口增长仍意外跃升 19
item.description: 泰国 9 月份的出口增幅为三年来最大，摆脱了美国总统唐纳德-特朗普征收关税的影响。【原文：Thailand’s exports rose the most in three years in September, shrugging off tariffs imposed by US President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 美团寻求通过双币债券销售融资 30 亿美元
item.description: 美团计划融资约 30 亿美元，这将是该公司有史以来规模最大的一次定期债券发行，因为该公司面临着中国食品配送市场日益激烈的竞争。【原文：Meituan plans to raise around $3 billion in what would be its largest regular bond issuance ever, as the company faces intensifying competition in China’s food delivery market.】

item.title: 特朗普助推贸易协定乐观情绪，亚洲新兴资产攀升
item.description: 新兴亚洲股市跃升至四年多来的最高点，货币攀升，原因是与美国的贸易摩擦有缓解迹象，风险情绪有所改善。【原文：Emerging Asian stocks jumped to their highest in more than four years and currencies climbed as risk sentiment improved on signs of easing trade frictions with the US.】

item.title: 特朗普会晤前日本日经指数突破 50,000 点关键水平
item.description: 蓝筹股日经 225 指数首次突破 50,000 点这一心理关口，日本新首相对经济增长的乐观态度以及中美摩擦的缓解提振了投资者的情绪。【原文：The blue-chip Nikkei 225 Stock Average surpassed the psychologically key level of 50,000 for the first time as investor sentiment was boosted by growth optimism under Japan’s new prime minister and easing US-China frictions.】

item.title: 菲律宾央行行长认为随着贪污问题日益严重，将采取更多宽松措施
item.description: 一位官员表示，由于腐败丑闻对经济造成的影响可能会持续到2026年底，菲律宾央行可能会在12月再次下调关键利率，并在明年进一步下调。【原文：The Philippine central bank may cut its key interest rate again in December and further next year, as the economic fallout from a corruption scandal may linger through the end of 2026, an official said.】

item.title: 中国太阳能行业自律促使硅制造商扭亏为盈
item.description: 中国最大的太阳能电池板用多晶硅生产商发出信号，该行业在经历了过去几年的严重亏损后，已开始扭转颓势。【原文：China’s largest producers of polysilicon for solar panels have signaled a turnaround in the industry’s fortunes after steep losses over the past couple of years.】

item.title: 安瓦尔称特朗普会晤后芯片关税暂时不是问题
item.description: 马来西亚总理安瓦尔-易卜拉欣说，唐纳德-特朗普总统告诉他，美国和马来西亚将 "在适当的时候 "处理美国对半导体征收关税的问题。【原文：Malaysian Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim said President Donald Trump told him the US and Malaysia will deal with US tariffs on semiconductors “at the appropriate time.”】

item.title: 香港赛马会向加拿大公司出售价值 10 亿美元的投资组合
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，香港赛马会已将其基金组合中价值 10 亿美元的资产以折扣价出售给总部位于多伦多的 Dawson Partners 公司，这是亚洲资产配置机构最大的出售交易之一。【原文：The Hong Kong Jockey Club has sold $1 billion worth of assets from its fund portfolio at a discount to Toronto-based Dawson Partners, according to people familiar with the matter, marking one of the biggest disposals by an asset allocator in Asia.】

item.title: 分析师估算印度炼油商放弃俄罗斯石油的成本
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 中国人民银行摒弃谨慎基调，释放力挺人民币信号
item.description: 中国央行在推动扩大人民币在全球货币体系中的作用方面似乎采取了更加强硬的立场。【原文：China’s central bank appears to be taking a more assertive stance in its push to expand the yuan’s role in the global monetary system.】

item.title: 米莱大获全胜，阿根廷投资者蓄势待发
item.description: 哈维尔-米莱伊总统在立法选举中的强势表现甚至超过了最乐观的预测，缓解了投资者对他对这个危机频发国家的经济改革将停滞不前的担忧，阿根廷资产将因此反弹。【原文：Argentine assets are set to rally as President Javier Milei’s strong showing in legislative elections beat even the most bullish of forecasts, easing investor concern his economic overhaul of the crisis-prone nation would stall.】

item.title: 前中国人民银行顾问离经叛道地呼吁实施 2008 年式大规模刺激计划
item.description: 一位前央行顾问表示，中国应让投资在提振经济方面发挥更大作用，他与其他知名分析师的观点不同，主张大力推进基础设施建设。【原文：China should let investment play a larger role in boosting the economy, a former central bank adviser said, breaking with the views of other prominent analysts by arguing in favor of a big infrastructure construction push.】

item.title: 安瓦尔称特朗普会晤后芯片关税暂时不是问题
item.description: 马来西亚总理安瓦尔-易卜拉欣说，唐纳德-特朗普总统告诉他，美国和马来西亚将 "在适当的时候 "处理美国对半导体征收关税的问题。【原文：Malaysian Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim said President Donald Trump told him the US and Malaysia will deal with US tariffs on semiconductors “at the appropriate time.”】

item.title: 预计日本央行将举行高市就任首相以来的首次会议
item.description: 人们普遍预计，日本央行将在周四举行的首次会议上维持利率不变。【原文：The Bank of Japan is widely expected to hold interest rates on Thursday at its first meeting since Sanae Takaichi, an advocate of easy monetary policy, became prime minister.】

item.title: 中国股市上涨，有望达成全面贸易协议
item.description: 周一，中国股市上涨，原因是有迹象表明世界上最大的两个经济体即将达成全面贸易协议。【原文：Chinese stocks rose on Monday, on signs that the world’s two largest economies are nearing a comprehensive trade deal.】

item.title: 软银支持的 Lenskart 首次公开募股将筹资高达 8.28 亿美元
item.description: 眼镜零售商 Lenskart Solutions Ltd. 表示，随着印度新上市市场的升温，其即将在孟买进行的首次公开募股将寻求筹集多达 728 亿卢比（8.28 亿美元）的资金。【原文：Eyewear retailer Lenskart Solutions Ltd. said its upcoming initial public offering in Mumbai will seek to raise as much as 72.8 billion rupees ($828 million) as India’s market for new listings heats up.】

item.title: 价格战缓和，中国工业利润创 2023 年以来最大增幅
item.description: 中国工业企业的盈利创下了近两年来的最高纪录，这是因为在政府控制过剩产能的运动中，生产加速，而出厂价格的跌势有所缓解。【原文：Chinese industrial companies saw their earnings surge the most in nearly two years, as production revs up while declines in factory-gate prices ease amid a government campaign to rein in excess capacity.】

item.title: 特朗普抵达，日本高市支持活动高调启动
item.description: 上周末进行的民意调查显示，日本首相高市真奈的新政府获得了很高的支持率，这为她准备迎接美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的访问提供了一些动力，而特朗普的访问可能会给新首相带来新的推动力。【原文：Support for Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi’s new government started on a high note according to polls conducted over the weekend, giving her some momentum as she prepares for a visit by US President Donald Trump that could give the new premier another boost.】

item.title: Street Wrap：中美贸易框架是利好，等待签约
item.description: 据分析人士称，中美两国本周末的会谈是积极的，两国就一系列有争议的问题达成了一致，为两国领导人唐纳德-特朗普和习近平本周敲定协议创造了条件。【原文：The talks between the US and China this weekend were positive as the countries came to terms on a range of contentious points, setting the stage for leaders Donald Trump and Xi Jinping to finalize a deal this week, according to analysts.】

item.title: 亚洲最繁忙的财报周聚焦大型企业和科技股
item.description: 亚洲已进入本财报季最繁忙的一周，这对投资者来说是一个关键时刻，因为他们要寻找企业如何应对当前贸易紧张局势和经济不确定性的线索。【原文：Asia has entered its busiest week of the current earnings season, a crucial time for investors looking for clues on how companies are coping with ongoing trade tensions and economic uncertainty.】

item.title: 中美贸易谈判取得进展，铜价将测试历史新高
item.description: 随着中美两国即将达成一项全面协议以缓和贸易紧张局势，缓解全球经济增长面临的重大风险，铜价将测试历史新高。【原文：Copper is set to test a record high with the US and China on the cusp of a sweeping deal to dial down trade tensions, easing a major risk to global economic growth.】

item.title: 韩国面临房地产 "定时炸弹"，李在镕支持 BOK 持股
item.description: 韩国总统李在明上周支持韩国央行维持利率不变的决定，并警告说韩国房地产市场是一个即将破灭的泡沫。【原文：South Korean President Lee Jae Myung warned that the country’s property market is a bubble on the point of bursting, as he backed the Bank of Korea’s decision to hold rates last week.】

item.title: 中美贸易紧张局势出现缓和迹象，大豆跳涨
item.description: 大豆期货周一开盘上涨 1%，此前财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）表示中美两国接近达成贸易协议，其中可能包括 "大量 "购买大豆作物。【原文：Soybean futures rose 1% at the open on Monday after Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent flagged that the US and China were close to a trade deal which could include “substantial” purchases of the crop.】

item.title: 日本首位女性财务总监是银行政策方面的资深专家
item.description: 片山聪树是日本第一位女性财政大臣，也是近几十年来为数不多的曾在强大的官僚机构担任过官员的女性之一。【原文：Satsuki Katayama is Japan’s first female finance minister, and also one of the few in her job in recent decades that previously worked as an official at the powerful bureaucracy.】

item.title: 中美贸易进展缓解避险需求，黄金跌幅扩大
item.description: 随着中美贸易协议的临近，以及有迹象表明贵金属炙手可热的涨势已走得太快太远，黄金出现了自 8 月中旬以来的首次单周下跌。【原文：Gold declined — after posting its first weekly drop since mid-August — as the US and China neared a trade agreement and on signs that a scorching rally in precious metals has run too far, too fast.】

item.title: 华为电动车合作伙伴 Seres 寻求在香港上市，融资 17 亿美元
item.description: Seres集团股份有限公司开始接受投资者的香港上市申请，此次上市可能募集高达132亿港元（17亿美元）的资金，使这家电动汽车制造商成为最近一家在金融中心上市的大型中国公司。【原文：Seres Group Co. started taking investor orders for a Hong Kong listing that may raise as much as HK$13.2 billion ($1.7 billion), making the electric-vehicle maker the latest big Chinese company to go public in the financial hub.】

item.title: 力拓对奥尤陶勒盖铜矿腐败问题展开调查
item.description: 力拓集团子公司奥尤陶勒盖有限责任公司（Oyu Tolgoi LLC）正在对其蒙古铜矿运营中的腐败和不道德行为指控进行内部调查，并寻求执法部门的帮助。【原文：Rio Tinto Group subsidiary Oyu Tolgoi LLC is conducting an internal investigation into allegations of corruption and unethical conduct at its copper operations in Mongolia and has sought help from law enforcement.】

item.title: 华纳兄弟发现出售，亿万富翁互相争夺
item.description: 其首席执行官试图拒绝派拉蒙的邀请。BTS 计划进行有史以来最大规模的巡演。【原文：Its CEO tries to head off Paramount's offer. BTS plans its biggest tour ever.】

item.title: 英国首相将在利雅得访问期间力促海湾地区达成贸易协议
item.description: 英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）将在访问沙特阿拉伯期间寻求加快与海湾国家的贸易谈判，因为她试图在其关键的预算案出台前提振该国的经济增长前景。【原文：UK Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves will seek to accelerate trade talks with the Gulf states during a visit to Saudi Arabia, as she tries to boost the country’s growth prospects ahead of her crucial budget.】

item.title: 中美贸易前景乐观，石油价格创六月以来最佳一周涨幅
item.description: 由于对中美两国将在本周达成贸易协议、从而提振需求前景的乐观情绪升温，石油价格在创下 6 月中旬以来的最大单周涨幅后上扬。【原文：Oil advanced after notching its biggest weekly advance since mid-June, as optimism increased that the US and China will reach a trade agreement this week that will boost the outlook for demand.】
